mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sns_post ( post_id, member_id, hashtag, content, write_date, thumbnail, likes, cmts ) VALUES( post_id_seq.nextval, #{ memberId }, #{ hashtag }, #{ content }, #{ writeDate }, #{ thumbnail }, 0, 0 )

INSERT INTO sns_media ( media_id, post_id, media_type, img_url, video_url, file_name, file_realname, dir_name ) VALUES( media_id_seq.nextval, #{ postId }, #{ mediaType }, #{ imgUrl }, #{ videoUrl }, #{ fileName }, #{ fileRealname }, #{ dirName } )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sns_post WHERE post_id = #{ postId }
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, member_id, content, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM ( SELECT s.post_id ,s.member_id ,s.content ,s.thumbnail ,s.likes ,s.cmts FROM sns_post s JOIN member m ON(s.member_id = m.member_id) WHERE m.role = 1 ORDER BY likes DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
SELECT post_id, member_id, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM sns_post
SELECT post_id, member_id, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM sns_post ORDER BY post_id DESC
SELECT post_id, member_id, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM sns_post ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT s.post_id, f.following_id, s.thumbnail, s.likes, s.cmts FROM sns_post s, follow f WHERE s.member_id = f.follower_id AND s.member_id = #{ memberId } ORDER BY post_id DESC

SELECT m.member_id, m.nickname, m.profile_img, m.intro, POST_CNT, FOLLOWER_CNT, FOLLOWING_CNT FROM member m, ( SELECT member_id, COUNT(post_id) POST_CNT FROM sns_post GROUP BY member_id) s, ( SELECT following_id, COUNT(follower_id) FOLLOWER_CNT FROM follow GROUP BY following_id) f_1, ( SELECT follower_id, COUNT(follower_id) FOLLOWING_CNT FROM follow GROUP BY follower_id) f_2 WHERE m.member_id = s.member_id AND s.member_id = f_1.following_id AND f_1.following_id = f_2.follower_id AND m.member_id = #{ memberId }

SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(hobbies, '[^,]+', 1, Level) hobbies FROM member WHERE hobbies is not null AND member_id = #{ memberId } CONNECT BY LEVEL <= REGEXP_COUNT(hobbies, '[^,]+') AND PRIOR member_id = member_id AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <=5
mapper.update: MERGE INTO hashtag h USING (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(hashtag, '[^,]+', 1, Level) hashtag FROM sns_post WHERE hashtag IS NOT NULL AND post_id = #{ postId } CONNECT BY LEVEL <= REGEXP_COUNT(hashtag, '[^,]+') AND PRIOR post_id = post_id AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL ) p ON (h.hashtag = p.hashtag) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET h.use_count = h.use_count+1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(h.hashtag) VALUES(p.hashtag)
